Text: I almost forgot, I wanted to tell you how great your graphic novel pack was. There was some great stuff in there. Those X-Men and Uncanny X-Men Masterworks were the cherry on top. I never seen those issues in such clarity before. They reminded me why I started reading in the first place. If you find or have anymore of the other volumes please include in future packs.  I'm gonna be reading those FF Visionaries volumes with a gigantic smile on my face. You are the man!

thanks marvelnerd76. i am working on a 4th graphic novel pack, but unfortunately haven't found any more marvel masterworks yet. that scanner, Bchry-DCP, does outstanding work on tradepaperbacks and GNs. it's amazing. thanks again for your kind words! i'll keep chugging along as much as possible!
